revised_title: The Theory of Musical Systems and Cyclical Systems of Formulae
tldr: The authors present a study on the theory of musical systems and cyclical systems of formulae, focusing on the division of the octave and the treatment of musical systems obtained. They discuss various methods for finding equivalent ratios in different musical systems, and explore the importance of regular systems in forming symmetrical scales. The authors also introduce a notation system for representing musical intervals and discuss the application of different musical systems to various instruments.
